text: @JoeBiden 115,000 can fit in Wolverine Stadium. Imagine COVID 19 has taken away that many people and more each day! This President is killing people with no direction, no empathy, no plan and just wishes it will go away with the summer breeze. Vote them all out November 3! #COVID19 https://t.co/U07b0GrJZR
